dct_title_s: York Town, and Gloucester Point : as besieged by the Allied Army
dct_description_sm: Relief shown by hachures. In upper margin: Plate IX; engraved for Dr. Gordon's History of the American War.; to face page 196, vol. iv. Oriented with north to upper left. Includes index to troop positions, firing lines, fortifications, and ship positions.
